OnBoarding.description: The easiest way to create NFTs and share them with others. Start minting NFTs in NEARApp’s rapidly expanding ecosystem.

SignIn.temrs_privacy_text: By clicking continue you must agree to NEAR Labs

Verification.title: Verification
Verification.email_description: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to the email address
Verification.phone_description: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to your phone
Verification.send_to_different_email: Send to a different email address
Verification.send_to_different_phone: Send to a different phone number

CreateNEARAppsAccount.title: Create NEARApps Account
CreateNEARAppsAccount.description: Enter an Account ID to use with your NEAR account. Your Account ID will be used for all NEAR operations, including sending and receiving assets.
CreateNEARAppsAccount.terms_privacy_text: By creating a NEARApps account, you agree to the NEARApps Wallet
